translation.pe: I design and develop experiences that make people’s lives simpler through Web and Mobile apps.I work with FIgma , HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative and Flutter.
Я проектирую и разрабатываю решения, которые упрощают жизнь людей с помощью веб- и мобильных приложений. Я работаю с FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative и Flutter.

Men veb va mobil ilovalar orqali odamlarning hayotini soddalashtiradigan tajribalarni ishlab chiqaman va ishlab chiqaman. Men FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative va Flutter bilan ishlayman.
